title: Xbox app on Windows rolling out new game installation and modding features
content:
The Microsoft Store (previously known as the Windows Store) garnered plenty of criticism during the Windows 10 era, as it lacked some of the features that were common in other application installers and game launchers. Many of those complaints were also related to the Xbox app, an additional component used for Xbox Game Pass access

The post Xbox app on Windows rolling out new game installation and modding features appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Microsoft is adding some long-awaited features to the Xbox app for Windows, including the ability to move game installations and mod games.
